title: Me trying to Get out of B5 to B1.
body:
Howdy All,

So I'm a casual Uni student and play LOL in my free time.
Thought that I would do a climb list/ladder thing, where I write down all my games from 0LP until I get up to say B1. Not sure if it's a smart idea, but it will let me see where I can improve or what I did wrong.
I don't main a specific role, but I have choices for each lane.
I suppose it's something to do. Maybe keep you entertained too.

P3

replies.body: I started Bronze 5 this season (finished b3 in preseason haha). I've played about 50-60 games and now I'm B1! I should have done something like this because I think I definitely improved. In bronze remember to cs as well as you possibly can while roaming to get others fed. There are too many people in Bronze that either cs poorly or only care about kills... (I have to admit my cs needs a lot of work too haha). Also, try not to die as much because you are making the game harder for yourself as the other gets more fed and you dont get to cs for 1-2 minutes as you are dead/walking to lane - (a 3/0 Vayne with 200cs at 20min is better than a 5/5 Vayne with 150cs at 20min) Good Luck!

>(a 3/0 Vayne with 200cs at 20min is better than a 5/5 Vayne with 150cs at 20min)

Also to do with this sort of stuff, don't steal kills if your feeding, reseting your kill gold only helps the enemy team, i'd rather someone go 10 deaths if they have 0/10/20 over 10/10/10 because they are giving more gold up by taking the kills, and probably not being any more helpful with the kills.
I actually realise that makes sense in regards to the above. Thanks for the advice!
Sigh, logged in on NA server...
And as a jungler, camp the person with the biggest losing streak... hehe

Start learning a certain role a main a champion pool of about 3-4 champs that you have fun playing with. This narrows down from having all those champions you see other players play well at but have no idea how to play them yourself.
Remember to always plays Comfort picks instead of counter picks when trying to get out of Bronze & Silver. Playing a champion you're comfortable on will always be more liking to win your lane than one you're not but is a counter pick.
If your win rate is below 50% and you have played over 300+ games, you might be better off leveling a smurf and try again.  However your skills must have improved.

Yeah I have thought about that, I'm not sure if my win rate is below 50%. In norms I do fairly fine, then I get into Ranked, and it just sorta goes downhill. But I suppose, I can only look at myself 
and do the best I can.

G8: 32LP – 46LP

My Team: Riven – Me – Top, Kalista and Morgana – Bot, Akali – Jungle, Yasuo – Mid.
Their Team: Lee Sin – Top, Ashe and Alistar – Bot, Sejuani – Jungle, Annie – Mid.

VICTORY. +14LP. Went 11/12/10. 15.1k Gold. 204 CS.

Everything pretty much worked out in that game, everyone worked well together, no one fed too much, and it was smoothish. We didn’t push at one point, and that was a pretty bad move, we got picked off, and Lee got fed a little, Sejuani got strong last game, Morgana hit a load of snares, and Yasuo was fine, but things went half and half. Main thing: Push when you get the chance, if you have the lead, keep it going.

G7: 7LP – 32LP

My Team: Skarner – Me – Jungle, Ahri – Mid, Leona and Jinx – Bot, Fiora – Top.
Their Team: Shaco – Jun/gle, Zed – Mid, Tristana and Orianna – Bot, Cho’Gath – Top.

VICTORY. +25LP. Went 8/17/25. 18.3k Gold. 154 CS.

Dayum, Zed got fed, and then later Shaco got fairly OP. When I ganked Bot or mid, tried to give the kills, but sometimes stole them. Jinx carried us a lot, Fiora went okay, Leona was a god support, and Ahri just got dominated. Got 5 drags and 1 baron, thought we did alright. The other team didn’t push so much, and we sorta just pushed and pulled for the whole game. Pretty even. I just died way too much.

G6: 26LP – 7LP

My Team: Riven – Me – Mid, Master Yi – Jungle, Xin Zhao – Top, Ezreal and Leona – Bot.
Their Team: Lee Sin – Mid, Nidalee – Jungle, Irelia – Top, Jinx and Sona – Bot.

Defeat. -19LP. Went 4/9/7. 10.4k Gold. 172 CS.

I had a good easy lane. Xin got destroyed Top by Irelia, she got fed badly. Ezreal afk’d about 6 minutes into the game, and so caused a bit of pressure on us. Couldn’t recover either.

G5: 41LP – 26LP

My Team: Sona – Me and Jinx – Bot, Kayle – Mid, Rengar – Jungle, Riven – Top.
Their Team: Corki and Morgana – Bot, Akali – Mid, Talon – Jungle, Teemo – Top.

Defeat. -15LP. Went 8-8-18. 12.4k Gold. 25 CS.

Dominated early game. Won lane with Jinx, but Kayle and Rengar fed Akali and Talon.

G4: 57LP – 41LP

My Team: Annie – Me and Vayne – Bot, Riven – Jungle, Zed – Mid, Garen – Top
Their Team: Lucian and Thresh – Bot, Warwick – Jungle, Heimerdinger – Mid, Xin Zhao – Top

Defeat. -16 LP. Went 1/12/7. 6.6k Gold. 7 CS.
Played pretty badly, got distracted and died a fait bit. Everyone played bad pretty much. We tried.

G3: 42LP – 57LP

My Team: Vel’koz – Me – Mid, Sejuani – Jungle, Tryndamere – Top, Kalista and Morgana – Bot.
Their Team: Katarina – Mid, Shyvana – Jungle, Maokai – Top, Ashe and Gragas – Bot.

VICTORY. +15 LP. Went 14/9/19. 16.5k Gold. 194 CS.

Went great, Won lane easily vs Kat, perhaps enemy was new to her? Felt like I got Ks’d a lot, but I was initiating in teamfights a little, so responsible for my own deaths and caused too many assists. Picked up a triple at dragon, with my ult, almost got quad, but Tryndamere dunked Ashe, lol. Sejuani ganked well, and was great for dmg and tank. Overall, stoked with game. Sejuani carried a fair bit.

Get OBS (Open Broadcasting Software). Record each game and use them to see how your games go. It's great what you can see when you're not 'in the zone' and can analyze things more objectively; you can see more mistakes and improve that way.

G2: 26LP – 42LP

My Team: Riven – Me – Bot, Kalista – Bot, Zed – Mid, Tryndamere – Jungle, Xin Zhao – Top.
Their Team: Teemo and Blitzcrank – Bot, Kayle – Mid, Shaco – Jungle, Gnar – Top.

VICTORY. +16LP. Went 2/2/6. 5.2k Gold. 35 CS.

Went good. Gave kills to Marksman, Top and Jungle. Support riven works, but build some Health and Thornmail to counter the range of their marksman. Zed and Xin Zhao got fed. Overall, game should have gone longer than 21 mins, to see how I would have done late game.

G1: 0LP – 26LP
My Team: Riven – Me – Top, Caitlyn and Morgana – Bot, Master Yi – Jungle, Viktor – Mid.
Their Team: Wukong – Top, Vayne and Nami – Bot, Cho’Gath – Jungle, Ahri – Mid.

VICTORY. +26LP. Went 8/9/5. 15k Gold. 269 CS. 

I went sort of badly, dominated before 6 vs Wukong, then died a fair bit. Underestimated Wukong. Sort of got carried. Lost lane due to deaths, but out farmed Wukong majorly. Morgana dominated bot with Caitlyn and won lane. Viktor won lane. Overall was good, but should remember to not underestimate or feed opponent.
